context_bundle.summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) - Anthropic's open standard for connecting AI assistants to data sources. Universal protocol for LLM-to-system integration using JSON-RPC, stdio, and SSE transports.

onboarding.quick_start: MCP = 3 primitives: Prompts (templates), Resources (data), Tools (functions). Transport: stdio (local) or HTTP+SSE (remote). Protocol: JSON-RPC stateful sessions.
common_patterns: Client connects via stdio for local, HTTP+SSE for remote
Stateful sessions maintain context across requests
Use official SDKs: @modelcontextprotocol/sdk for TypeScript, Python SDK available

known_errors.solution: Check transport type, verify stdio path or HTTP endpoint
known_errors.prevention: Use official SDK templates, test transport first
